root.name: Basketbrawl
root.description: Basketbrawl was released for the Atari 7800 in 1990 and the Atari Lynx 1992. Developed and published by Atari, the game was a basektball / beat em' up hybrid. Players could punch opponents in order to steal the basketball. The game was an early influence on the subsequent arcade genre' of basketball games, such as NBA Jam.Basketbrawl gameplay
